TimeSensitiveLogic.LogTimestamps: Log entries use now (current block timestamp) for recording transaction times.

ConditionalLogicPaths.DepositConditions: Different paths based on msg.value > MinDeposit in Deposit function.
ConditionalLogicPaths.CashOutConditions: Different paths based on _am <= balances[msg.sender] in CashOut function, with reentrancy risk during external calls.
